question: You came to know about a piece of equipment that would help you at your workplace. Write a letter to your manager. In your letter•	describe the equipment•	explain how it might be helpful in your workplace•	offer help in purchasing it.
text: I hope this letter finds you well. I am writing this letter to make a recommendation on office grocery.

I recently came across an interesting electrical gadget. It is a watch, shares a resemblance with the Apple watch. However, it is sold at a cheaper price and it is multifunctional. People can use it for audio and video recording.

I find this item extremely helpful, especially when it comes to conference recording. As you may be aware, I always have a difficult time catching up with the speaker, so I miss lots of key points at the conference. With the help of this watch, I can note down all the information swiftly.
This watch can be found on many commercial online shopping websites. You may also directly contact the sales person by calling 0920393. They will provide more detailed information to you if required.
